Thanks everyone again for your invaluable feedback on 'REST for the
Rest of=
 Us' [1].  I've finally integrated most of it.  While doing so,
I realized =
that a REST Lexicon [2] for quick reference would be really
useful as well.=


Is there such a thing I can borrow definitions from?  Attribution will
be=
 done by links.  Any pointers/suggestions appreciated.


Cheers,

- Steve
